metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18671 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Roundcube Mail <=1.4.4 via smtp config in /installer/test.php.

notes.Note: ccdm94> same fix as the one applied for CVE-2020-18670.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
